title: It’s the Underwear Olympics
author: VD
content_html: I have to admit, I’m not that interested in the NFL Combine. If you can’t tell if a man is a football player from the tapes of his games, what is a stopwatch going to tell you? Now, if they televised the interviews, that might be interesting.
content_text: I have to admit, I’m not that interested in the NFL Combine.  If you can’t tell if a man is a football player from the tapes of his games, what is a stopwatch going to tell you?  Now, if they televised the interviews, that might be interesting.
